text: Death Watch () is a 1980 French German science fiction movie directed by Bertrand Tavernier and was based on 1973 novel The Unsleeping Eye by David G. Compton. It stars Harvey Keitel, Romy Schneider, Harry Dean Stanton, Max von Sydow, Caroline Langrishe, Vadim Glowna. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 science fiction movies Category:French science fiction movies Category:German science fiction movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Bertrand Tavernier Category:Movies about death Category:Movies about diseases Category:Movies about television
title: Death Watch
